embed.description: Asking for a friend. 1st. Does Evelynn even have reproductive organs? can a demon be impregnated? does the form she takes automatically come with them, or does she have to try to have one? 2ed. can a human even impregnate a demon? how does the physiology work? 3rd.

replies.body:
Here is a somewhat real answer.

Demons are not biological beings. They are spirits, they're created from a miasma of pain and emotions. So you're more likely to give birth to one stubbing your toe. {{sticker:sg-kiko}} 

It might seem limiting, but sometimes it can be interesting to consider how little we understand and can relate to demons, as human beings. They're spirits, they're hunger. It makes them scarier, IMHO. Especially when this first realization falls away, and you see they were us all along...

I'm sorry if this makes Ev harder to ship with Kayn. But limitations can drive some relationships; tsundere, etc.
Are demons able to feed only on pain and negative emotions? If that's the case, should we assume that they have limited free will or can they go against their own nature?

haha it's fine and thank you for doing this.  Even if it started out as a bunch of shitposts it really got me curious.  I find it very strange that Eve may have an actual daddy, though.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

[Well, since these are the kind of questions getting answered lately... Can the ascended?](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/LUoUJ79w-riot-heres-the-question-do-the-ascended-have-genitals?comment=000e0000)

Evelynn is a demon of lust, who seduces and even has sex with her targets before killing them. As such, she obviously has reproductive organs, but she likely does not have a menstrual cycle/eggs, which are a requirement for pregnancy.

Where did you find the confirmation that she has sex with her victims and that she has reproductive organs? She is a shapeshifting mass of energy and she states she only needs "a single touch with desire."

> [{quoted}](name=Legend of Rammus,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=h5gkBqpz,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-08-13T23:15:33.452+0000)
>
> Where did you find the confirmation that she has sex with her victims and that she has reproductive organs? She is a shapeshifting mass of energy and she states she only needs "a single touch with desire."

Several other quotes.

"The height of their happiness is the depth of their pain."

"I can't feel anything, until they do."

This is the story Joe was talking about: https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/evelynn-color-story/

...Nothing in that story confirms or even supports that she has sex with her victims?

Here's a quote from Eve's narrative writer JohnODyin on her AMA:

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/771kmz/we_did_the_evelynn_update_ask_us_anything/doiberb/

sab39 (random redditor): "So once and for all - does she actually have sex with her victims before/while killing them or not?"

JohnODyin: "I don't think it ever actually gets to that point. Without being too explicit, I don't think she functions in that way. Sorry to disappoint."
hot

No, and whatever she'd spawn wouldn't have an actual form. The eve you see is just one of her shapeshifts to lure her easiest targets (humans).

she's an incarnation of agony, its like if kindred could breed and make more death.

She can have sex, but other then feel, nothing happens really afterward. 

Was it confirmed she does have sex with her victums? I feel like all she does is lure them with the promise of sex, let them get the first touch, then thats their ass.

> [{quoted}](name=Tormentula,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=h5gkBqpz,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-08-13T22:47:17.419+0000)

> 
> Was it confirmed she does have sex with her victums? I feel like all she does is lure them with the promise of sex, let them get the first touch, then thats their ass.
>
it was confirmed, she gets a man right to the point of orgasm, and then starts killing them right as they do..
she has to kill at the height of their pleasure, to take as much agony as she can.
Source if it was confirmed? Evelynn says she only needs a "single touch with desire."

> [{quoted}](name=Legend of Rammus,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=h5gkBqpz,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2018-08-13T23:12:04.121+0000)
>
> Source if it was confirmed? Evelynn says she only needs a "single touch with desire."

she also says "the height of their pleasure is the depth of their pain."
so the more pleasure they're feeling, the more she enjoys it.. on top of that, alot of her quotes hint to her actually having sex with them..
 i cant find it, but i'll keep looking, but they did have a story for her that made it more obvious

[None of her quotes do hint at her having sex](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Evelynn/Quotes)

She has some tease lines, which can turn somebody on enough to touch her, but nothing is specifically mentioning her having or in the middle of sex.

All her orgasmic quotes aren't sexual pleasure either, they're her reaction to pain. Its like when you taking a piss you've been holding after a tank meta game and you're like "AAAAAHHH YISSSSS", thats what she's feeling when she hurts something.

"The moment they think they have me..." Evelynn laughs. "Yeah, that's what I live for."

Thats probably her best quote reguarding this, she wants her prey to think they're actually going to get sex, thats when she cuts all their hopes away and hurts them emotionally, then physically.

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/771kmz/we_did_the_evelynn_update_ask_us_anything/doiberb/

here ya go. John O'Dyin is Eve's lead narrative writer.

I dont think that confirms she had sex with the man.

You can do a lot of things to trigger an orgasm without actually having sex. Fuck we can do it ourselves.

By eve's standards, all the guy has to do is come in contact, so before he even gets deep enough she probably doesn't waste time and cuts into him.
says u
No she is shapeless.

> [{quoted}](name=mrmeddyman,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=h5gkBqpz,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-08-13T22:51:13.254+0000)
>

but the original post was also asking if a DARKIN could impregnate her.. or at least a human with darkin influence.. darkin are by far more powerful than humans.. probably more powerful than demons..

I don't know how that would change the circumstance at all. Like someone else said Eve is formless she only takes the form of a female because she can use it to lure men to her. She technically doesn't need reproductive organs to do that. Does she even have DNA? The reason why Evelynn lays the sexuality on so thick is that she doesn't really come from a place where she can understand where sexuality comes from, because she isn't a biological lifeform with an actual sex drive she's faking it to the best of her abilities.

There's no need to reproduce so why would she even copy that from humans?
Wtf I just answered that, and no because noone can see her in her passive.
twisted fate can.  your argument is invalid
